metadata.description: Address range of the virtual network
Subnet name that will contain the App Service Environment

Whether to rebuild the VNET (yes) or not (no)
Resource Group where VNET is created
Name of the Azure SQL Managed Instance

properties.description: Management ports for the Managed Instance
Allow inbound traffic from all VMs in VNET
Allow inbound traffic from azure load balancer
Allow outbound traffic from all VMs to all VMs in VNET
Allow outbound traffic from all VMs to Internet
Management ports for the Managed Instance
Used to manage ASE from public VIP
